title: First to Five: Spin Serve Only
description: Win a game to 5 points where every serve must have significant spin (topspin, backspin, or sidespin).

title: Around the World Rally
description: Complete a 10-shot rally where each player must hit the ball to a different quadrant of the opponent's side on consecutive shots (e.g., forehand corner, backhand corner, middle-forehand, middle-backhand). Both players attempt this.

title: Precision Target Practice
description: Stick five removable targets on your side of the table; first player to hit all five targets in any order wins the round.

title: Paddle Swap Chaos
description: After each rally point, both players must swap paddles and immediately serve. Play to 11 with paddle-switching after every point.

title: No Spin Challenge
description: Play a best-of-3 match where no spin is allowed—any spiny serves or returns incur an automatic penalty point.

title: Blindfolded Return
description: One player is blindfolded and must return 10 consecutive rally shots led by the unblindfolded opponent; then switch roles.

title: Marathon Master
description: Keep a continuous rally going for 100 hits without letting the ball drop; if the rally breaks, start over from zero.

title: Balloon Rally
description: Use a balloon instead of a ping-pong ball and rally back and forth without letting it touch the ground. First to 10 rallies wins.

title: Paddle Juggle
description: Balance your paddle on your forehead between shots during a rally. If the paddle falls, you lose the point.

title: Spoons and Forks
description: Play a quick game using a spoon in one hand and a fork in the other instead of paddles.

title: Handicap Serve Challenge
description: Experienced player must serve with their non-dominant hand and win a game to 11 against a less experienced opponent.

title: Restricted Backhand
description: Experienced player can only use backhand strokes for the entire match, while novice can use any stroke. Play to 11.

title: Feed and Feast
description: Novice gets to feed every ball gently to start the rally; the experienced player must win the point in three shots or less. First to 11.

title: Target Serve Challenge
description: Serve 10 balls aiming at specified targets; score 1 point for each successful hit, first to 8 points wins.

title: Half-Table Rally
description: Play a rally where both players can only hit the ball within the half of the table closest to the net; keep it going for 30 shots.

title: Loop-Only Marathon
description: Maintain a continuous topspin rally for 100 strokes without breaking; no pushes or blocks allowed.

title: Third Ball Attack Drill
description: Practice serving, then attacking the third ball over 20 points; points only count when the attack ends the rally.

title: Multi-Ball Serve & Receive
description: Coach feeds 30 balls with varying spins; player must correctly return each serve into the open table area.

title: Backhand Loop Drill
description: Recover and loop 50 backhand balls fed by coach; score progress by consecutive success.

title: Push and Block Duel
description: Rally for 50 pushes against blocks; one player pushes, the other blocks, then switch roles.

title: Serve Variation Game
description: Play to 11 points; server must alternate spin type (topspin, sidespin, backspin) each serve.

title: Footwork Circuit
description: Place cones in four corners; player must hit the ball then run to the next cone before the next feed; complete 20 feeds.

title: Defense to Attack Transition
description: Defender returns 20 attacking loops with blocks or chops, then counterattacks the next ball.

title: Power Drive Challenge
description: Both players play only powerful flat drives; first to 15 points wins.

title: Reaction Feed Drill
description: Coach feeds random wide shots; player must react and return within two steps; complete 30 successful returns.

title: Mirror Rally
description: Two players stand facing each other and mirror the opponent’s shot placement and spin for 50 shots.

title: Angle Smash Drill
description: Practice setting up and executing angled smashes for 20 successful points against a multi-ball feed.

title: Serve & Receive Pressure
description: Alternate serving and receiving; returner must win the point after each serve; first to 10 wins.

title: Narrow Table Drill
description: Play using only one half-width of the table; maintain a rally for 40 shots.

title: Spin Deception Game
description: Server disguises spin; receiver must call out the spin type before returning; correct calls score extra points.

title: Continuous Rally Timer
description: Time how long you can sustain a rally; goal is to beat previous time. Track best sessions.

title: Chop Return Drill
description: Player practices chopping against incoming loops; complete 30 chops with consistent depth and backspin.

title: King of the Table
description: Four players rotate; winner stays on, challengers wait in queue; first to win three consecutive matches is king.
